posts.post_content:
After long debate I am now looking for these cards below in Poor to fair condition. I am looking to do this set so if you have anything out there pref graded lmk. A-2 is really where I would be at but i am open to non graded as well. Thanks everyone. I will be posting photos of the cards as they come in so make sure to watch such a great set be put together
